pr_title: [FLINK-20429][kafka] Using proper watermark interval in KafkaTableITCase.testKafkaTemporalJoinChangelog test

timeline.bodyText: Would be better to use 1 second.
timeline.author: wuchong
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -551,7 +551,7 @@ public void testKafkaTemporalJoinChangelog() throws Exception {
 						"  order_time TIMESTAMP(3),\n" +
 						"  quantity INT,\n" +
 						"  purchaser STRING,\n" +
-						"  WATERMARK FOR order_time AS order_time\n" +
+						"  WATERMARK FOR order_time AS order_time - INTERVAL '10' SECOND\n" +

timeline.message: [FLINK-20486][hive] Hive temporal join shouldn't require a minimal 1h monitor interval
[FLINK-20486][hive] Hive temporal join shouldn't require a minimal 1h monitor interval
